note.original: kiṃ sīhā nappaṭinadanti (sī. pī.), na sīhā paṭinadanti (ka.)

note.previous: Omadda khippaṃ palighaṃ, esikāni ca abbaha
Appaṃ pivitvāna nihīnajacco, so majjatī tena janinda puṭṭho
Netaṃ sīhassa naditaṃ, na byagghassa na

note.original: mummure (syā.), maṃ pure (ka.) mummurasaddo thusaggimhi kukkuḷe ca vattatīti sakkatābhidhānesu
note.extra: mummurasaddo thusaggimhi kukkuḷe ca vattatīti sakkatābhidhānesu

note.previous: Brāhmaṇaṃ teva pucchāma, kannu tesaṃ vanimhase
Na taṃ daḷhaṃ bandhanamāhu dhīrā, yadāyasaṃ dārujapabbajañca

note.original: sobhanti macchā gaṅgeyyā, atho sobhanti yāmunā (syā. pī.)

alternatives.alternative: sobhanti macchā gaṅgeyyā, atho sobhanti yāmunā
sobhanti macchā gaṅgeyyā, atho sobhanti yāmunā

note.previous: Sobhati maccho gaṅgeyyo, atho sobhati yāmuno
Dūraṃ gataṃ yena ca avhayanti, so tyāgato
Atthi me puriso deva, sabbakiccesu byāvaṭo
Tayo giriṃ antaraṃ kāmayāmi, pañcālā kuruyo kekake ca

note.original: abhidhāvathā ca patathā ca, vividhavinaditā ca dantibhi; vattatajja tumulo ghoso, yathā vijjutā jaladharassa gajjatoti; (sī. pī. ka.)

alternatives.alternative: abhidhāvathā ca patathā ca, vividhavinaditā ca dantibhi; vattatajja tumulo ghoso, yathā vijjutā jaladharassa gajjatoti;
abhidhāvathā ca patathā ca, vividhavinaditā ca dantibhi; vattatajja tumulo ghoso, yathā vijjutā jaladharassa gajjatoti;
abhidhāvathā ca patathā ca, vividhavinaditā ca dantibhi; vattatajja tumulo ghoso, yathā vijjutā jaladharassa gajjatoti;

note.original: abhidhāvathā ca patathā ca, vividhavinaditā ca dantibhi; vattatajja tumulo ghoso, yathā vijjutā jaladharassa gajjatoti; (sī. pī. ka.)

alternatives.alternative: Vattatajja tumulo ghoso yathā, vijjulatā jaladharassa gajjatoti
abhidhāvathā ca patathā ca, vividhavinaditā ca dantibhi; vattatajja tumulo ghoso, yathā vijjutā jaladharassa gajjatoti;
abhidhāvathā ca patathā ca, vividhavinaditā ca dantibhi; vattatajja tumulo ghoso, yathā vijjutā jaladharassa gajjatoti;
abhidhāvathā ca patathā ca, vividhavinaditā ca dantibhi; vattatajja tumulo ghoso, yathā vijjutā jaladharassa gajjatoti;

note.previous: Vattatajja tumulo ghoso yathā, vijjulatā jaladharassa gajjatoti
Tameva so tattha sutena khādati, anariyo vuccati dupāhanūpamoti
Soyaṃ saṃkuṭito seti, chinnatanti yathā viṇāti
Kāmaṃ yahiṃ icchasi tena gaccha, viddhosi mammamhi
So haññati ñātisakhāna majjhe, macchānugo soriva suṃsumāroti
Yadā caññe vilumpanti, so vilutto vilumpatīti
Sabbo jano hiṃsito piṅgalena, tasmiṃ mate paccayā
